patthana18.21:1.1_0: Saññojanaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.21:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana18.21:2.1_0: Ganthaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.21:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana18.21:3.1_0: Oghaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noogho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.21:4.1_0: Yogaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noyogo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.21:4.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana18.21:5.1_0: Nīvaraṇaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.21:5.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri … vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana18.21:6.1_0: Noparāmāsaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoparāmāso nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.21:6.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi … vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
